title: Thrasher Magazine
content:
I was looking for both of these typefaces. Are they both custom? If so, is there anything that resembles them?  
The "thrasher" looks like a common one.  
Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [thrasherbumper.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20150318042939/http:/typophile.com/files/thrasherbumper.gif) | 9.68 KB |
author: samiam1973

comments.content: Thanks. I need the other one also.

I dont think the other font comes with the connecting lines. I think you could simulate it with [Cholla Sans Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150318042939/http:/www.emigre.com/fontpage.php?PChoSaI.html) and some widening.It has the right M and G, and no other obvious mismatches in letterforms, as far as I noted.

- Mike Yanega
